name: Namrata Naikpawar
position: Future Mobility | Autonomous Vehicles | Transit Ticketing | Clean Transport | Capital Grants
about: A conference enthusiast with demonstrated history of producing industry specific meetings across the globe. I have been instrumental in creating successful conferences within transit, pharma, biopharma, big data and analytics, automotive and transportation industry. I am a huge people-person and hence believe in laying an emphasis on building a strong and positive relationship with partners. I work hard to create a platform where the whole ecosystem can come together to discuss challenges, regulations, innovations and exhibitions that showcases novel products and services along with networking opportunities.
